::DrillBit::

DrillBit drill up, out front the Prdicon base.
"DrillBit, terrorize." He transformes to bot mode.

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod emerges from the CR chamber, and steps outside the Ark.
"Is the battle over?"

(OOC: This is my last post, untill Sunday night. I'm leaving for
BotCon2000, in the morning. Untill I return, Hot Rod and DrillBit are in
the hands of Yanshosh. Bye.)
